name: Highway Traffic Driver
description:
Highway Traffic Driver is a car simulator which brings the user in a world of racing and avoiding other cars! This is one of the very best racing game, the main objective of the game is to avoid the traffic racers and get the best score you can get. Do not touch the other vehicles on the highway otherwise you will loose and you will not get the highest score! You will have to drift away from the other vehicles in the big city and push your engine to the limit. Get now one of the best car games from our collection of racing games. Earn as much points as you can and enjoy the ride in the city! Drift,boost,roll, jump, drive and crash your car in our all new extreme traffic race paradise! Your driving skills will be put to the test, try not to crash your machine into others and become the best driver there is! Driving games are one of the best selling category and this game is no stranger to this!

Highway Traffic Driver Features:

1. High-definition 3D car models and enemy motor models
2. Race with incredible speeds till you get the best high-score
3. Realistic 3d cars
4. A beautiful motor and other sports car that you have to avoid
5. Share your best score on twitter!
6. Easy to use driving controls, touch controls are implemented in the game!
7. Humongous collection of super cars with high quality graphics!

Download Highway Traffic Driver now and push your driving skills to the limits!
